summary: WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE OVER HEATED AND CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO CUT OFF.  THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED. *NLM    WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE OVER HEATED AND CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO CUT OFF.  THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED.  CONSUMER HAS REPAIRED SO MANY THINGS ON THIS CAR AND IT STILL IS NOT RIGHT.  FOR INSTANCE RADIATOR WAS REPAIRED TWICE AND IT BURNED OUT.  WATER PUMP REPAIRED AND ITS STILL LEAKING.  ELECTRICAL WORK DONE TO TAIL LIGHTS.  TIRE EQUIPMENT HAS SILVER TREADS COMING OUT OF THEM.  *MR
